June 10, 1899 D Northern Band Association (Championship Section)
Northern Band Association (Championship Section) 0 Test Piece Contest
northern-band-association-championship-section
Memories of Rossini [arr. W. Rimmer]
Ashington, Northumberland, England, UK
1st prize £10 and cup valued at £31.10s. 2nd prize £6. 3rd prize £4. 4th prize £2. 5th prize £1. 6th prize 10s.
March contest 1st (£1) Hartlepool Temperance, 2nd (10s.) Consett Ironworks.
7 bands competed.
April 13, 2012, 9:55 p.m. April 13, 2012, 10:04 p.m.

3 Hartlepool Temperance William Holdsworth
4 Rise Carr W. H. Crowther
